title: Need a 1st floor 1 bed? Free heat and internet
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   It’s impossible to walk into the lobby at 451 W. Wrightwood and not have a jaw dropping moment of awe. That’s how splendid this gorgeously restored lobby is—with original 1920’s detailing and rumors abounding that it was an Al Capone favorite hangout.  Great central location in Lincoln Park. Lake access, public transportation, and shopping are all within walking distance.  HEAT, NATURAL GAS, TRASH, AND WATER INCLUDED IN RENT.  UNIT FEATURES  Wood Flooring  Spacious Walk-In Closet  Window A/C  Updated Kitchens w/ Dishwashers  Large Windows  BUILDING AMENITIES  Fitness Room  Laundry Room  Sundeck  Bike Storage  Secure Intercom Entry  Door Person  Complimentary Fiber Internet  Direct T.V. Family Package Programming Amenity  Text me @ 312.522.9185 for more information Sierra Wilson BJB Properties  Pricing and availability is subject to change Pictures may represent model or unit with same or similar layout
